FuncDef: This command is used to call another policy by name and evaluate it as a subroutine, or to evaluate a logical expression of subroutine policies.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of a single policy-statement (up to 64 characters in length) or a policy logical expression (up to 255 characters in length) consisting of policy-statement names (enclosed in square brackets), logical operations ( and ,  or ,  not ), and parentheses for grouping.
